com.bandyer.core_av.capturer

Class Capturer.Registry

  • com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.Capturer.Registry
  • Enclosing interface:
    Capturer

    public static class Capturer.Registry

    Registry to create capturers Capturers are limited by hardware, there can be only one capturer for camera and screen, while there can be multiple capturers for audio.
